EmailTemplate.subject: We have a Community Solar Share for you!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Still thinking about solar?
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
You previously chatted with our team about joining your local BlueWave Community Solar farm and we wanted to follow up on the benefits and sign up process.
Community Solar provides an easy, practical way for you to go solar without installing solar panels.
No Money Down - Sign up today and pay nothing until you start seeing solar savings show up on your utility bill each month. 10% Monthly Energy Savings - Pay for your solar credits at a discount each month. Plus, online automated bill pay takes the hassle out of your day! No Installation Necessary - You enjoy the stable energy savings of solar without dealing with a physical rooftop installation or associated maintenance. No Cancellation Fees - Change your mind? Now it's no problem to end your contract early, simply give us 90 days' notice and we charge no cancellation fee. Feel good! Your local farm creates local jobs and reduces air pollution
Ready to Sign Up? Click Here: https://bluewavememberportal.force.com/apply/s/csap
Want to talk to someone before making your decision?
We're here for you! (844) 786-4100 customercare@bluewavesolar.com
We hope you join the BlueWave Solar Community for access to savings, and a whole lot more!
- All of us here at BlueWave
